nodes.text: Fondana Tiree was the Imperial Minister of Education on Lothal during the Age of the Empire. She was the mother of Kinera Tiree, who attended Phelarion School. Due to her senior position, Fondana was well known to local government officials. While helping Zare Leonis to find his missing sister Dhara Leonis, Merei Spanjaf impersonated Fondana's daughter Kinera during a data breach at the Transportation Ministry's headquarters in Capital City.
